details: Developing accessible interfaces for a Django ecommerce site.
Leading an initiative to research and adopt new bundler tools that could speed up frontend builds by over 97%.
Documented 6 year-old idiosyncratic frontend build process to aid in onboarding new engineers.
Mentored teammates on flexbox/grid CSS layouts during development and in code reviews.
Designed and developed a professional profile site for an actor, styled with Tailwind CSS and hosted on Netlify.
Created a drag-and-drop shipping label editor for a screen printing shop that reduced order fulfillment time by 25%.
Redesigned and developed a public-facing static website and logo for an ear, neck, and throat medical practice.
Designed and redesigned web application UI/UX from user flows to interactive prototypes for various clients including Valassis Digital and Experian.
Led engineering team in user-centric design workshops.
Implemented designs with both AngularJS and Angular.
Built reporting data visualizations with D3.js.
Prototyped CSS animations on att.com's device recommender page as part of an effort to convert 40% of device upgrades to online.
Designed and developed UIs for an internal dashboard application which displays visualizations of process log data.
Refactored JavaScript and C# code with gulp.js for an IT business management software-as-a-service in accordance with corporate style guides.
